UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Puroindolines, Pin alleles, hordoindolines and grain softness proteins are sources of bactericidal and fungicidal peptides.
Literature.Author: Phillips RL, Palombo EA, Panozzo JF, Bhave M

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>250µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>250µg/ml),Colletotrichum graminicola(MIC=>250µg/ml),Drechslera brizae(MIC=250±0µg/ml),Fusarium oxysporum(MIC=>250µg/ml),Rhizoctonia solani(MIC=125±0µg/ml),Rhizoctonia cerealis(MIC=>250µg/ml)
